td.content: s:a 54 YO white female presents with 5 days history of critical severe low back pain, critical new cluster of microcalcification in the right breast, critical denial of breast pain or discharge and Cancer. Patient does not smoke Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 157 cm, Weight 81.3 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16, Stereotactic core needle biopsy under mammography shows breast parenchyma wiht large lactiferous ducts, the parenchyma shows multiple proliferative and fibrocystic changes. Proliferative changes include usual ductal hyperplasia, papillary ductal hyperplasia, apocrine metaplasia and papillary apocrine metaplasia a:Breast Cancer p:administered FASLODEX - 250 mg/5 IM, performed Stereotactic core needle biopsy under mammography, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
